device_mode: Select between Luma-1 (Drum Machine) and Luma-Mu (Expansion) modes.
tab_midi: Monitor incoming and outgoing MIDI data
tab_librarian: Manage your sample library in Google Drive
btn_login: Login with Google Drive to load and save samples.
midi_out_device: Select target MIDI device to send and receive data.
btn_read_sample: Read the current sample from the connected Luma device
btn_write_sample: Write the current sample to the connected Luma device
btn_export_wav: Download the current sample as a WAV file
btn_read_bank: Read the entire sample bank from the device
btn_write_bank: Write the entire bank to the device
btn_export_bank_zip: Download the entire bank as a ZIP file
btn_export_bank_rom: Download the bank as a raw ROM file
canvas_editor:
Key Shortcuts:
-/+ zoom
hover mouse over center of zoom position
<space> preview sample
canvas_scrollbar: Scrollbar canvas, drag to scroll in editor.
canvas_slot: Sample memory slot on the device. Drag selections from the editor above to this slot to assign. To commit to the device use write buttons.
select_binary_format: Choose how to interpret a binary sample file (.bin)
input_out_point: Selection end point in sample offset.
select_sample_rate: Adjust playback sample rate for editor, does not modify sample data.
select_slot_id: Choose which slot on the device to load from/save to.
select_bank_id: Choose which bank on the device to load from/save to.
input_sample_name: Name of the sample for display on slots and in banks.
input_bank_name: Name of the bank for when exporting to a bank (zip) file.
btn_stretch_16k: Stretch current sample to 16384 bytes in length.
btn_read_ram: Read pattern memory RAM from device.
btn_write_ram: Write pattern memory RAM to device.
btn_download_ram: Download pattern memory RAM as a raw ROM file.
btn_read_picorom: Read bank from connected PicoROM device.
btn_program_picorom: Program (write) bank to connected PicoROM device.
